Sentencas: In the process industry, a utility system is one of the main energy consumption and pollution emission sources.
Titulo: Process integration of solid oxide fuel cells with process utility systems

Sentencas: Significant progresses have been made in the chemical industry to improve the efficiency and reduce the emissions of utility systems.
Titulo: Process integration of solid oxide fuel cells with process utility systems

Sentencas: However, few efforts have been made in investigating the possibility and strategy of incorporating new energy conversion devices such as fuel cells into industrial energy systems.
Titulo: Process integration of solid oxide fuel cells with process utility systems

Sentencas: The article presented focuses on systematic integration of fuel cells and industrial energy systems.
Titulo: Process integration of solid oxide fuel cells with process utility systems

Sentencas: A steady-state model of an indirect internal reforming solid oxide fuel cell (IIR-SOFC) system has been developed to estimate its thermodynamic and electrochemical properties and to optimise system performance.
Titulo: Process integration of solid oxide fuel cells with process utility systems

Sentencas: The model is then applied to the integration study of SOFCs into utility systems.
Titulo: Process integration of solid oxide fuel cells with process utility systems

Sentencas: Different process integration options are investigated and evaluated.
Titulo: Process integration of solid oxide fuel cells with process utility systems

Sentencas: Case studies show significant benefits of energy efficiency improvement and emission reductions by incorporating fuel cells into industrial utility systems.
Titulo: Process integration of solid oxide fuel cells with process utility systems
